mapper.insert: insert into product_tbl(cate_id, prod_name, prod_price, prod_amount, prod_discount, prod_maker, prod_content, prod_uploadfolder, prod_img, prod_forsale) values (#{cate_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_amount}, #{prod_discount}, #{prod_maker}, #{prod_content}, #{prod_uploadfolder}, #{prod_img}, #{prod_forsale})
mapper.select: select prod_id, cate_id, prod_name, prod_price, prod_amount, prod_discount, prod_maker, prod_content, prod_uploadfolder, prod_img, prod_forsale, prod_regdate, prod_updatedate from product_tbl order by prod_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
